sn35.10:1.3: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitesu rupesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:1.5: paccuppannanam rupanam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn35.10:1.12: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitesu dhammesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:1.14: paccuppannanam dhammanam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti”ti.
